summary: This is an internal email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York discussing CNN's pursuit of a story about an individual who came to the office in 2015/2016 with their attorney to raise questions about Jeffrey Epstein's Florida plea deal. The email notes CNN believes the matter was not elevated to senior leadership and went nowhere.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is referenced as the subject of a Florida plea deal that an individual came to the SDNY office to question in 2015/2016.

events.title: Individual raises questions about Epstein plea deal
events.description: An individual, accompanied by their attorney, came to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to raise questions about Jeffrey Epstein's plea deal in Florida.

events.title: CNN pursues story on Epstein plea deal inquiry
events.description: CNN is pursuing a story about how an individual approached the SDNY in 2015/2016 regarding Epstein's Florida plea deal, believing the issue was not raised to senior leadership.

keyFacts: In 2015/2016, an individual and their attorney approached the SDNY to question Jeffrey Epstein's Florida plea deal.
CNN was pursuing a story in August 2019 about this inquiry, believing it was not elevated to senior leadership at the SDNY and went nowhere.
The email indicates internal awareness and discussion within the U.S. Attorney's Office about potential media scrutiny of their handling of Epstein-related matters.
